steps.nodeStepDescription: This weapon causes kinetic damage.

Precision sight. 
Highest zoom in class. 
Enhanced range.

Flexible sight. 
Enhances handling, range, and recoil control.
Increases Attack Power, allowing this weapon to cause more damage.
Increases Attack Power, allowing this weapon to cause more damage.
Melee kills automatically reload a portion of this weapon's magazine.
This weapon has increased stability.
When zoomed, this weapon fires slower, but causes additional damage.
This weapon has bonus accuracy while firing from the hip.
The bottom half of each magazine causes additional damage.
Kills with this weapon reduce the cooldown of your grenade.
It's easier to aim under fire using this weapon.
Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.
Recovering from near death grants additional ammo and briefly increases reload speed.
Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.
Reloading this weapon after a kill grants a damage bonus for a short time.
Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.
This weapon grows more accurate the longer it is fired.
Crouching grants improved accuracy and stability, as well as reduced aim time and flinch-under-fire.

Increases weapon stability.

Ceramic-jacketed rounds ricochet on hard surfaces.
